overview:
Paul Kenny is the Founder and Chief Executive Officer of Cobone.com, a company he founded in late 2010 and is now recognised as one of leading eCommerce companies in the Middle East and North Africa.

Paul is a proven business leader with hands on execution experience in building great Internet companies. He is also recognised as a thought leader in the digital space and is regularly featured in the press talking about Middle East going online.

He is also a start-up fund Ambassador for Enterprise Ireland, a Mentor at Seedstartup, a Co founder of the Irish Business Network, a part time lecturer at the Digital Marketing Institute Middle East and a mentor and adviser to numerous companies around the world.

Paul has recently been nominated for the Entrepreneur of the Year award 2012 by Ernst and Young and also has been selected as the 10th most influential person under the age of 30 in the Middle East, and one of the 25 most important people in technology in the region.

Paul has also been nominated for the Gulf Entrepreneur of the Year 2012 by Gulf Business.
